org.hazelwire.gui
Class ConfigFile

java.lang.Object
  org.hazelwire.gui.ConfigFile

public class ConfigFile
extends java.lang.Object

This class keeps track of both the configurations the user specifies and the default configurations that Hazelwire provides.

getDefault

public java.lang.String getDefault(java.lang.String key)
This method finds the default value for a specific option.

Parameters:
key - String consisting of the name of the configurable option.
Returns:
the default value associated with this particular option, or null, if no such option exists.

getActual

public java.lang.String getActual(java.lang.String key)
                           throws java.io.IOException
This method finds the current (possibly user adapted) value for a specific option.

Parameters:
key - String consisting of the name of the configurable option.
Returns:
the current value this option has, or null, if no such option exists.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

Parameters:

resetActual

                 throws java.io.IOException

Parameters:
